ygData.subject: Re: Jewelcraft
ygData.msgSnippet: That would be nice, but its not the case. At NO POINT does ANY platinum jewlery become trivial. My skill is 190 at the moment. At 191 gold and Opal will become
ygData.messageBody:
That would be nice, but its not the case. At NO POINT does ANY platinum
jewlery become trivial. My skill is 190 at the moment. At 191 gold and Opal
will become trivial, and that is that. No other metal - gem combination
will be trivial after gold and Opal (Maybe gold and Ruby becomes trivial at
some point between 192 and 200, but I seriously doubt it). So get ready to
fail alot when you hit 191 and level 34. Platinum jewelry is a pain in the
ass, and it sure hurts the pocketbook when you fail...

Timn the Enchanter
"There are some who call me . . . Timn?"


At 01:30 PM 11/21/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>
>hey guys, small question about Jewelcraft
>My skill is currently 153, i hear that 200 is Max?
>does that mean at 200 skill, i can make anything? including all platinum
>stuff?
>
>>
